thread.title: Megan
thread.title_full: David Sklar & Associates Inc. reviewed by Megan

author: Megan
title: Megan
text: I was very nervous going into this but knew that I needed help to make changes. Ashley Carter was helpful from the very beginning, taking time to explain my options as well as answering all of my questions in ways I understood. Any time I've had to call, I've been given the support needed. Thank you for making this experience a positive one. I feel comfortable in my financial future.
